definitions.definition: a person who works in an office, dealing with records or performing general office duties:
a person who serves customers in a shop:
examples: Take your purchases to the clerk, and he will wrap them for you.

definitions.definition: a hotel employee who deals with guests when they arrive:
examples: The clerk checked us in and gave us our key.

definitions.definition: a person who works with a judge and helps the judge make decisions

examples: Debbie has a summer job clerking in an office.
